field.name: identifier
field.label: Committee Identifier
field.description: Unique identifier or number for this Committee

field.name: country_id
field.label: Country Code
field.description: Two letter ISO Code for this country e.g. DZ for Algeria

field.label: Moved by
field.description: Select the user who moved the document

field.label: Moved by
field.description: Select the user who moved the document

field.name: identifier
field.label: Government Identifier
field.description: Unique identifier or number for this Government

field.name: phone
field.label: Phone Number(s)
field.description: Enter one phone number per line

field.name: fax
field.label: Fax Number(s)
field.description: Enter one fax number per line

field.name: identifier
field.label: Ministry Identifier
field.description: Unique identifier or number for this Ministry

field.name: identifier
field.label: Office Identifier
field.description: Unique identifier or number for this Office

field.name: office_role
field.label: Role
field.description: Role given to members of this office

field.name: identifier
field.label: Parliament Identifier
field.description: Unique identifier or number for this Parliament

field.name: identifier
field.label: Identifier
field.description: Unique identifier or number for this political group

field.name: user_unique
field.label: Only one user may have this title
field.description: Limits persons with this title to one

field.name: sort_order
field.label: Sort Order
field.description: The order in which members with this title will appear relative to other members

field.name: phone
field.label: Phone Number(s)
field.description: Enter one phone number per line

field.name: fax
field.label: Fax Number(s)
field.description: Enter one fax number per line

field.name: login
field.label: Login
field.description: Must contain only letters, numbers, a period (.) and underscore (_). Should start with a letter and be between 3 and 20 characters long
